channel.title: Magazine News
channel.description: BBC News Magazine: in-depth features on topical issues plus a round-up of UK newspapers, your letters and a daily mini-quiz.

item.title: In praise of scepticism
item.description: In a light-hearted essay, Clive James takes a look at Montaigne, golf-ball crisps and our attitude towards climate change sceptics.

item.title: Truth and lies
item.description: I lied to my dying mother about Bloody Sunday

item.title: Super-size TV
item.description: Cool, or an energy guzzling style mistake?
